thread.section_title: Hotel Magenta 38 by HappyCulture - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value and service
thread.title_full: Good value and service - Review of Hotel Magenta 38 by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Anne C
title: Good value and service
text: nice clean hotel near main stations and metro. good clean rooms with all you need for a short stay. location great to see local day and night activities and easy to use metro to discover other attractions and night life. staff very helpful on all occasions .will definitely book again on next trip to paris..
